displayProperties.name: Explosive Payload
displayProperties.description: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact. Improves reload.

displayProperties.name: Mobius Conduit
displayProperties.description: Guarding doesn't consume energy. Early deactivation for Arc Staff.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Glaive
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Häkke Heavy Burst Fire
displayProperties.description: Fires a less stable burst of two high-damage, high-range rounds.

displayProperties.name: Apollonic Tangent
displayProperties.description: Arrows fired through a Guidance Ring release seeking projectiles, which do more damage based on distance traveled.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Rending
displayProperties.description: Primary ammo weapons do increased damage to [Stasis] Stasis crystals and frozen targets.

displayProperties.name: Encore
displayProperties.description: Final blows grant a stacking stability, range, and accuracy bonus to this weapon. Precision final blows grant more stacks.

displayProperties.name: Recombination
displayProperties.description: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot. Damage accelerates faster.

displayProperties.name: Cascade Point
displayProperties.description: Final blows or sustained precision hits with another weapon increase this weapon's rate of fire for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Ambush
displayProperties.description: Improves range, handling, and damage against combatants during the opening moments of an engagement.

displayProperties.name: The Fate of All Fools
displayProperties.description: Chain precision shots to increase body shot damage.

displayProperties.name: Ionic Return
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield—or the shield of a Guardian using a Super—with the matched damage type refills the magazine from reserves and grants bonus damage rounds. Breaking a combatant's shield with a matched damage type Ionic Return round refreshes the perk.

displayProperties.name: Tex Balanced Stock
displayProperties.description: Damaging targets while firing from the hip increases handling, reload speed, and movement speed while aiming down sights.

displayProperties.name: Quickdraw
displayProperties.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast. Reload is improved.

displayProperties.name: Offhand Strike
displayProperties.description: Final blows grant additional weapon range, stability, and accuracy when firing from the hip for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Air Assault
displayProperties.description: Final blows grant an improved stacking bonus to airborne effectiveness. Final blows while airborne grant increased stacks.

displayProperties.name: Rasputin's Arsenal
displayProperties.description: Breaking a target's shield partially reloads this weapon's magazine.

displayProperties.name: Cold Steel
displayProperties.description: Powered Sword hits slow targets. Improves ammo capacity.

displayProperties.name: Target Acquired
displayProperties.description:
When Personal Assistant is active, this weapon has better target acquisition, deals significantly more precision damage, and
jolts the target.

displayProperties.name: Chain Reaction
displayProperties.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion. Improves ammo reserves. Swords have improved guard endurance.

displayProperties.name: Panoptic Tessellation
displayProperties.description: Deploying a Guidance Ring or striking a target with a seeking projectile improves draw time and reload speed for a moderate duration.

displayProperties.name: Hunter's Trace
displayProperties.description: Precision hits grant heavy rounds. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Close to Melee
displayProperties.description: Glaive projectile final blows improve Glaive melee damage. Glaive projectile or melee damage extends the duration.

displayProperties.name: Perfect Float
displayProperties.description: Being in combat for a moderate time increases airborne effectiveness and reduces flinch until you are out of combat.

displayProperties.name: Guidance Ring
displayProperties.description: Charges and deploys a guidance system.

displayProperties.name: Target Lock
displayProperties.description: Damage increases the longer this weapon remains on a target.

displayProperties.name: Reign Havoc
displayProperties.description: Final blows generate lightning strikes. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Bountiful Harvest
displayProperties.description: Chance to obtain additional Glimmer when harvesting.

displayProperties.name: Unrelenting
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers improved health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target.

displayProperties.name: Grave Robber
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves. Improves handling.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Cheer
displayProperties.description: An ally is using Enhanced Cheer, granting all members of your fireteam the chance to gain additional Dawning Essence upon activity completion.

displayProperties.name: Swooping Talons
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage while airborne increases this weapon's damage output.

displayProperties.name: Reconstruction
displayProperties.description: This weapon reloads itself at an improved rate over time, up to double capacity.

displayProperties.name: The Fundamentals
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Changes this weapon's damage type.

displayProperties.name: Runneth Over
displayProperties.description: Reloading near allies overflows the magazine an improved amount.

displayProperties.name: Sharp Shooting
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases the duration and effectiveness of the Tex Balanced Stock Origin Trait and the Veist Stinger Origin Trait.

displayProperties.name: Resilient Retrofit
displayProperties.description: Increases resilience by +5.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Hand Cannons.

displayProperties.name: Pulse Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Pulse Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Energy Diffusion Substrate
displayProperties.description: Gain a small amount of resistance to all damage dealt to you by combatants. Additional copies of this mod will increase this effect.

displayProperties.name: Air Assault
displayProperties.description: Final blows grant a stacking bonus to airborne effectiveness. Final blows while airborne grant increased stacks.

displayProperties.name: Timed Payload
displayProperties.description: Projectiles attached to targets explode after a short delay. Increases stability.

displayProperties.name: Firing Line
displayProperties.description: This weapon deals increased precision damage when near two or more allies. Handling is increased.

displayProperties.name: Encore
displayProperties.description:
Final blows grant a stacking stability, range, and accuracy bonus to this weapon. Precision final blows grant more stacks.
Effect duration is improved.

displayProperties.name: Mobile Retrofit
displayProperties.description: Increases mobility by +5.

displayProperties.name: Bow Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Bows.

displayProperties.name: In-Flight Compensator
displayProperties.description: Increases the airborne effectiveness of all equipped weapons.

displayProperties.name: Legacy Ambush
displayProperties.description: Increases the duration and effectiveness of the Ambush Origin Trait and the Bray Inheritance Origin Trait.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Grenade Launchers over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Shot Swap
displayProperties.description: Final blows build and store charges which allow you to swap and stow this weapon at an additionally improved rate.

displayProperties.name: Headseeker
displayProperties.description: Body shots landed with this weapon increase precision damage and aim assist for a short time. Body shots landed while the perk is active refresh the time.

displayProperties.name: Häkke Light Burst Fire
displayProperties.description: Fires a stable burst of four lightweight rounds.

displayProperties.name: Knock 'Em Down
displayProperties.description:
Your Solar Supers are enhanced. Deadshot Golden Gun has damage resistance, Marksman Golden Gun has increased duration, and Blade Barrage launches more projectiles.

While radiant, final blows with your equipped Throwing Knife fully refund your melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Vex Incursion Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a Vex incursion appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Swirling Leaf Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a green petal appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Target Lock
displayProperties.description: Damage increases by an improved amount the longer this weapon remains on a target.

displayProperties.name: Charged with Blight
displayProperties.description: Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of Darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in Darkness and temporarily blinding them.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Light
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power increases the next projectile's blast radius and damage. Increases the stack count limit.

displayProperties.name: Seraph Reboot Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a seraphic reboot appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Cheer
displayProperties.description: You are using Enhanced Cheer to earn Dawning Essence at an increased rate. Your fireteam has an elevated chance of receiving additional Dawning Essence upon activity completion.

displayProperties.name: Cornered
displayProperties.description: Faster charge time or draw time and increased stability when surrounded by combatants.

displayProperties.name: Double Fire
displayProperties.description: Hard-hitting twin-fire rounds.

displayProperties.name: Judgment
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage with this weapon envelops the target in a field that increases vulnerability to Arc damage and stuns them. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Soaring Fang
displayProperties.description: Ground damage charges; airborne extends.

displayProperties.name: Bray Inheritance
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage regenerates a small amount of ability energy.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Grenade Launcher
displayProperties.description:
When you ready or reload a Grenade Launcher, for a short period, that weapon stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Advance Scout
displayProperties.description: Champions you stun take additional damage from teammates.

displayProperties.name: Counter Charge
displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light whenever you or a member of your fireteam stuns any Champion.

displayProperties.name: Low Entropy Superconductor
displayProperties.description:
Stasis and Arc melee abilities stun unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Lord Kelvin's Basilisk
displayProperties.description:
Void and Stasis grenades cause disruption, delaying ability regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Dawning Surprise
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets awards a Dawning gift. Defeated powerful targets count as more than one.

displayProperties.name: Close to Melee
displayProperties.description: Glaive projectile final blows improve Glaive melee damage for an improved duration. Glaive projectile or melee damage extends the duration.

displayProperties.name: Perfect Float
displayProperties.description: Being in combat for a moderate time increases airborne accuracy and reduces flinch until you are out of combat for an extended duration.

displayProperties.name: Solo Operative
displayProperties.description: While you are the only member of your fireteam, you deal increased damage to all combatants.

displayProperties.name: Energy Accelerant
displayProperties.description: Your Dragonfly, Chain Reaction, and Firefly explosions deal more damage.

displayProperties.name: Weakened Clear
displayProperties.description: When using a Grenade Launcher, damaging a boss, damaging a Champion, or breaking a combatant's shield reloads your stowed weapons and weakens the combatant.

displayProperties.name: Monochromatic Maestro
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with elemental abilities grants increased damage to weapons of the same element for a short duration. Dealing damage with elemental weapons grants increased damage to abilities of the same element for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Passive Aggressive Guard
displayProperties.description: Receive less damage from combatants that are close to you while you are wielding a Glaive.

displayProperties.name: Vorpal Weapon
displayProperties.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active. Stability is improved. Swords have improved guard resistance.

displayProperties.name: Redirection
displayProperties.description: Damaging rank-and-file combatants increases damage against more powerful ones. Powerful shots consume fewer stacks.

displayProperties.name: Rapid-Fire Frame
displayProperties.description: Fires full auto with deeper ammo reserves. Faster reload when weapon is empty.

displayProperties.name: Cascade Point
displayProperties.description: Final blows or sustained precision hits with another weapon increase this weapon's rate of fire for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Genesis
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield. Also increases weapon handling.

displayProperties.name: Souldrinker
displayProperties.description: Gain an improved amount of health based on the number of hits before reloading.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Rounds
displayProperties.description: This weapon fires faster and more accurately the longer the trigger is held. Continuous damage generates stunning lightning strikes.

displayProperties.name: Boon of Friendship
displayProperties.description:
Grants a Dawning reward to your fireteam upon completion of a playlist activity, with additional rewards based on the number of players with Boons active.

Effect lasts until a reward is earned. Only one Boon of Friendship may be active per player.

displayProperties.name: Offhand Strike
displayProperties.description: Final blows grant additional weapon range, stability, and accuracy when firing from the hip for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Flying Monster
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon while airborne grant damage resistance.

displayProperties.name: Gift Stack Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a tower of presents to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Release the Wolves
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Greatly increases rate of fire and shoots in full auto.

displayProperties.name: Shot Swap
displayProperties.description: Final blows build and store charges which allow you to swap and stow this weapon at a faster rate.
You are using Enhanced Cheer to earn Dawning Essence at an increased rate. Your fireteam has an elevated chance of receiving additional Dawning Essence upon activity completion.
displayProperties.name: Enhanced Cheer

displayProperties.description: Energy-matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants for an improved duration.
displayProperties.name: Shield Disorient

displayProperties.description: An ally is using Enhanced Cheer, granting all members of your fireteam the chance to gain additional Dawning Essence upon activity completion.
displayProperties.name: Enhanced Cheer

displayProperties.description:
Combatants defeated with precision final blows have a chance to drop planetary materials.

Effect lasts for 4 hours.
displayProperties.name: Scavenger's Boon

displayProperties.description:
Grants a Dawning reward to your fireteam upon completion of a playlist activity, with additional rewards based on the number of players with Boons active.

Effect lasts until a reward is earned. Only one Boon of Friendship may be active per player.
displayProperties.name: Boon of Friendship

displayProperties.description: This weapon gains a boost to reload speed and stability as your health gets lower.
displayProperties.name: Underdog

displayProperties.description: Increases detonation damage as the projectile travels farther before exploding. Increases blast radius.
displayProperties.name: Full Court
